application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: RIVER LANE GATE		T1	Silver Birch (Betula pendula)	 Reduce over extended limb by 20%. The aim is to bring it back into its natural crown line.Crown lift by removal of 6 lowest smallest branches - Final height unchanged at 12m. Final spread = 8mBY GARAGES		T2	Ash	Crown lift over garages. Remove lowest limb over garage. Prune away from phone wires on clients side and on the alley side - Final height unchanged at 12m. Final spread unchanged at 10mT3	False Acacia (Robinia pseudoacacia)	Crown reduce by approximately2 m back to most recent previous reduction points. Final height 6m and spread 4m.	MAIN LAWN AREA		T4-T12	Redwood (Sequoia spp)	T7 facing old house - remove lowest limb growing over driveway. T13	Sycamore Crown lift by removing lowest 5 branches - Final height unchanged at 15m. Final spread unchanged at 9m.T14-T15	Yew	Reduce height of yew by up to 1m and trim both sides of yew creating a more formal shape - Final height 2.5m. Final spread 2m.T17	Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)	Adjacent to G1, growing close to the boundary wall, and following some dead and hanging branches that were removed at the same time as dealing with the split out stem from G1 - Reduce remaining crown by 25-30% (3m all round) to stabilise and shape following - Final height 12m. Final spread 10mG1 reduction or removal.SUNKEN PATIO AREA AND ADJACENT SUNKEN PATIO AREA	T18	Dead Pine	Fell to ground level.	T19	Dead Cherry	Fell to ground level.
site_name: Rutland Lodge145 Petersham RoadPetershamRichmondTW10 7AA
